vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
FreeEth.getFreebie (patch_18.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_18.sol#11)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_18.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_18.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in FreeEth.command (patch_18.sol#23-26):
	-require(bool)(_address.call.value(msg.value)(_data)) patch_18.sol#25

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_address' of FreeEth.command (patch_18.sol#23) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_data' of FreeEth.command (patch_18.sol#23) is not in mixedCase
